Controls.Description: All teams/groups must be granted minimum required permissions on build defination
Controls.Rationale: Granting minimum access by leveraging RBAC feature ensures that users are granted just enough permissions to perform their tasks. This minimizes exposure of the resources in case of user/service account compromise.

Controls.Description: Test or demo apps older than 3 (TODO) months should be removed from AAD.
Controls.Rationale: Demo apps expose attack vectors...don't keep them too long.

Controls.Description: All return URLs configured for an application must be HTTPS endpoints.
